events.message: The insured contacted us to file a claim regarding a car accident that occurred on the highway involving their vehicle.
After reviewing the initial report, the claim was categorised under Auto Accident due to the involvement of the insured’s automobile.
A claims agent was assigned promptly to handle the customer’s case to ensure smooth communication and timely updates.
The claimant was formally acknowledged and informed that the auto accident claim process has begun and an investigation will follow.
The agent requested the insured to submit all relevant documents, including photos of the damaged vehicle and the police collision report.
The insured submitted the requested documents on time, including medical reports for minor injuries sustained and repair cost estimates.
The claims team began investigating the circumstances of the vehicle collision, including interviewing witnesses and reviewing traffic footage.
The investigation concluded that the insured was not at fault in the car accident, confirming all submitted evidence as valid.
A settlement offer was proposed covering vehicle repair costs and medical expenses related to the auto accident claim.
The claimant responded positively to the proposed settlement, expressing satisfaction with the responsiveness and clarity of the process.
Following customer acceptance, the claim was approved, allowing the insurance company to proceed with payment disbursement.
The settlement payment was issued to the insured’s bank account promptly, covering all approved expenses connected to the accident.
The claim file was closed after confirmation that the insured received payment and all necessary repairs and medical treatments were completed.
